text: @JoeBiden Joe, We need the antidote to this insanity, drama & mistrust.  Get a panel for the plan to defeat COVID19.  Put @NYGovCuomo @BarackObama @ewarren with top minds, scientists & doctors to plan/roll out.  We need a return to Science, rationality, intellect, and basic human decency
